com.miguelfonseca.completely

Class Aggregator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.miguelfonseca.completely.Aggregator<T>

  • public class Aggregator<T>
extends Object
    Aggregator to collect, merge and transform ScoredObject elements.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Aggregator()
      Constructs a new Aggregator.
      Aggregator(Comparator<ScoredObject<T>> comparator)
      Constructs a new Aggregator.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean add(ScoredObject<T> element)
      Adds a single element, if not present already.
      boolean addAll(Collection<ScoredObject<T>> elements)
      Adds a collection of elements, if not present already.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Returns true if no elements exist.
      boolean retain(ScoredObject<T> element)
      Retain the elements in common, compared according to the objects scored.
      boolean retainAll(Collection<ScoredObject<T>> elements)
      Retains the elements in common, compared according to the objects scored.
      int size()
      Returns the number of elements.
      List<T> values()
      Returns a List of all objects scored, sorted according to the default comparator.
